definition: to hold/to grasp/to clench (one's fist)/to master/classifier: a handful
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in

sentences.english: We shooke hands and parted (as) friends.
We in the summer wind, say take care, good-bye.
sentences.chinese: 我們在夏天的風裏握別，說一聲珍重，再見。

sentences.english: Could you say goodbye to yesterday?
sentences.chinese: 你能否握別昨天的一切？
